com.example.federico.wearableui.controller

Class ViewportActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.federico.wearableui.intraprocess_messaging.IPMHCallbackInterface
      • com.example.federico.wearableui.controller.ViewportActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IViewportActivity

    public abstract class ViewportActivity
extends IPMHCallbackInterface
implements IViewportActivity
    This class defines the Activity that serves as the main controller for the system. All of its calls are executed on the Main Thread. This Activity implements IPMHCallbackInterface making it the delegate for all the callbacks used to handle the IntraProcessMessages received by the IntraProcessMessageHandler.
